workflow.name: Automate Instagram carousel creation with GPT-5, Nano Banana, and Blotato
workflow.description:
## üé® Instagram Carousel & Caption Generator on Autopilot (GPT-5 + Nano Banana + Blotato + Google Sheets)

### Description

**Watch the full step-by-step tutorial on YouTube:**
**https://youtu.be/id22R7iBTjo**
![automateinstagramcarouselnanobananan8nbuildalong 1.jpg](fileId:2970)

Disclaimer (self-hosted requirement):
This template assumes you have valid API credentials for OpenAI, Wavespeed/Nano Banana, Blotato, and Google.
If using n8n Self-Hosted, ensure HTTPS access and credentials are set in your instance.

### How It Works

Chat Trigger ‚Äì Receive a topic/idea (e.g. ‚Äú5 best podcast tips‚Äù).

Image Prompt Generator (GPT-5) ‚Äì Creates 5 prompts using the ‚ÄúHook ‚Üí Problem ‚Üí Insight ‚Üí Solution ‚Üí CTA‚Äù framework.

Structured Output Parser ‚Äì Formats output into a JSON array.

Generate Images (Nano Banana) ‚Äì Converts prompts into high-quality visuals.

Wait for Render ‚Äì Ensures image generation completes.

Fetch Rendered Image URLs ‚Äì Retrieves image links.

Upload to Blotato ‚Äì Hosts and prepares images for posting.

Collect Media URLs ‚Äì Gathers all uploaded image URLs.

Log to Google Sheets ‚Äì Stores image URLs + timestamps for tracking.

Caption Generator (GPT-5) ‚Äì Writes an SEO-friendly caption.

Merge Caption + Images ‚Äì Combines data.

Post Carousel (Blotato) ‚Äì Publishes directly to Instagram.

### Step-by-Step Setup Instructions
1) Prerequisites

n8n (Cloud or Self-Hosted)

OpenAI API Key (GPT-5)

Wavespeed API Key (Nano Banana)

Blotato API credentials (connected to Instagram)

Google Sheets OAuth credentials

2) Add Credentials in n8n

OpenAI: Settings ‚Üí Credentials ‚Üí Add ‚ÄúOpenAI API‚Äù

Wavespeed: HTTP Header Auth (e.g. Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>)

Blotato: Add ‚ÄúBlotato API‚Äù

Google Sheets: Add ‚ÄúGoogle Sheets OAuth2 API‚Äù

3) Configure & Test

Run with an idea like ‚ÄúTop 5 design hacks‚Äù.

Check generated images, caption, and logged sheet entry.

Confirm posting works via Blotato.

4) Optional

Add a Schedule Trigger for weekly automation.

Insert a Slack approval loop before posting.

### Customization Guide

‚úèÔ∏è Change design style: Modify adjectives in the Image Prompt Generator.

üìë Adjust number of slides: Change Split node loop count.

üí¨ Tone of captions: Edit Caption Generator‚Äôs system prompt.

‚è±Ô∏è Adjust render wait time: If image generation takes longer, increase the Wait node duration from 30 seconds to 60 seconds or more.

üóÇÔ∏è Log extra data: Add columns in Google Sheets for campaign or topic.

üîÅ Swap posting tool: Replace Blotato with your scheduler or email node.

### Requirements

OpenAI API key (GPT-5 or compatible)

Wavespeed API key (Nano Banana)

Blotato API credentials

Google Sheets OAuth credentials

n8n account (Cloud or Self-Hosted)

workflow.name: Carousel Image and Caption Generation on Autopilot

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert Viral Instagram Carousel creator. Your role is to create carousel image prompt for Nano Banana. You'll receive a user prompt to give you the topic/ideas for the carousel.

Here's the framework that you should use in coming up with the content:
Viral 5-Framework Carousel (Automation Demo)
Slide 1 ‚Äî Hook (Stop the Scroll)

Big, bold, curiosity-driven opener.
üëâ ‚ÄúStop wasting hours making Instagram posts üëá‚Äù

Slide 2 ‚Äî Problem (Pain Point)

Call out the frustration that everyone feels.
üëâ ‚ÄúPosting daily feels impossible. You design‚Ä¶ you write‚Ä¶ and still barely grow.‚Äù

Slide 3 ‚Äî Insight (The A-ha Moment)

Drop the truth bomb about why carousels matter.
üëâ ‚ÄúCarousels get more saves + shares than any other format.
More saves ‚Üí more reach ‚Üí more chance to go viral.‚Äù

Slide 4 ‚Äî Solution (Your Workflow Demo)

Show your automation stack clearly.
üëâ ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs how to post viral carousels on autopilot:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Create polished slides with NanoBanana
2Ô∏è‚É£ Format your post in n8n
3Ô∏è‚É£ Auto-post with Blotato‚Äù

(Visually show the workflow screenshots or arrows ‚Üí to keep it swipe-worthy.)

Slide 5 ‚Äî CTA (Engagement Driver)

End with a strong action.
üëâ ‚ÄúSave this workflow. Share it with a friend.
And start going viral without the grind.‚Äù

##Rules
Return the 5 prompts as a JSON object with a field called ‚Äòprompts‚Äô that contains an array of the prompt strings.

Prompt1 - Prompt to Nano Banana (Image 1)

Prompt2 - Prompt to Nano Banana (Image 2)

Prompt3 - Prompt to Nano Banana (Image 3)

Prompt4 - Prompt to Nano Banana (Image 4)

Prompt5 - Prompt to Nano Banana (Image 5)


## Example:

Image 1

Prompt to NanoBanana:
‚ÄúMinimalist bold Instagram carousel cover, dark background with neon accent, eye-catching text space, viral growth theme.‚Äù

Image 1 Text (Header & Subheader):
Header: Stop Wasting Hours on IG Posts
Subheader: Here‚Äôs how to go viral without the grind üöÄ

Image 2

Prompt to NanoBanana:
‚ÄúFrustrated person at laptop surrounded by messy drafts and notes, cartoon style, editable blank space for text overlay.‚Äù

Image 2 Text:
Header: The Problem
Subheader: Posting daily feels impossible. You design, you write‚Ä¶ and growth stays flat.

Image 3

Prompt to NanoBanana:
‚ÄúInfographic-style design showing upward trending arrow with Instagram logo, colorful and clean, strong highlight space for text.‚Äù

Image 3 Text:
Header: The A-Ha Moment
Subheader: Carousels = saves + shares ‚Üí algorithm boost ‚Üí viral potential

Image 4

Prompt to NanoBanana:
‚ÄúAutomation workflow concept ‚Äî arrows connecting AI brain ‚Üí workflow nodes ‚Üí Instagram app logo, sleek tech aesthetic.‚Äù

Image 4 Text:
Header: The Solution
Subheader: NanoBanana + n8n + Blotato = Viral Carousels on Autopilot

Image 5

Prompt to NanoBanana:
‚ÄúBright clean design with Instagram ‚Äòsave‚Äô and ‚Äòshare‚Äô icons, motivational style, bold colors, clear CTA space.‚Äù

Image 5 Text:
Header: Your Turn
Subheader: Save this, share it, and start posting smarter.

Instagram Carousel Caption:

‚ú® Carousels are the #1 way to grow on Instagram in 2025.
The problem? They take HOURS to design and post consistently.

Here‚Äôs the 3-step automation workflow I use to stay consistent without burning out:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Generate on-brand images in seconds with NanoBanana
2Ô∏è‚É£ Automate formatting and scheduling with n8n
3Ô∏è‚É£ Auto-post to Instagram using Blotato

The result ‚Üí More saves, more shares, more growth üöÄ

üí° Steal this workflow and never miss a post again.
üëâ Save this carousel if you want to try it.

values.content:
=You are an expert Instagram Caption Agent. You will receive a set of prompts that were used to generate Instagram carousel images. Based on these prompts, craft a compelling caption that is:

High-Hook: Start with a strong, attention-grabbing opening line.

SEO-Optimized: Naturally include relevant keywords that increase discoverability.

Engaging: Encourage saves, shares, and comments through questions, CTAs, or relatable phrasing.

Platform-Ready: Use a concise, mobile-friendly writing style with line breaks for readability.

Hashtag-Savvy: Include a well-balanced mix of trending and niche hashtags (without overstuffing).

The final caption should feel natural, authentic, and designed to maximize reach and engagement on Instagram.

##Rules
Output only post-ready Instagram Caption without any explanation.

parameters.content: Upload to Blotato and Merge Image Urls with Caption

üé® Instagram Carousel & Caption Generator on Autopilot (GPT-5 + Nano Banana + Blotato + Google Sheets)
Description

Turn your ideas into viral-ready Instagram carousels ‚Äî automatically.
This workflow combines GPT-5, Google‚Äôs Nano Banana, and Blotato to generate carousel images, craft engaging captions, log everything to Google Sheets, and even post directly to Instagram ‚Äî all on autopilot.

Just send your topic or idea, and the workflow will:

Create 5 visually consistent carousel prompts using a proven ‚ÄúViral 5-Framework.‚Äù

Generate high-quality images with Nano Banana.

Write an optimized caption with GPT-5.

Upload images to Blotato, log them to Google Sheets, and post them automatically.

üëâ Watch the full step-by-step tutorial on YouTube:
https://youtu.be/id22R7iBTjo

üí° Use Wavespeed‚Äôs Nano Banana via API

How It Works

Chat Trigger ‚Äì Start the workflow by sending a chat message with your carousel topic or idea.

Image Prompt Generator (GPT-5) ‚Äì Generates 5 image prompts using the ‚ÄúHook ‚Üí Problem ‚Üí Insight ‚Üí Solution ‚Üí CTA‚Äù viral content framework.

Structured Output Parser ‚Äì Formats the output into a clean JSON array ready for downstream automation.

Nano Banana (via Wavespeed API) ‚Äì Autogenerates high-quality visuals from each image prompt.

Wait + Retrieve Image Result ‚Äì Waits for the render to complete, then fetches the image URLs.

Upload to Blotato ‚Äì Uploads all generated images to Blotato for hosting or scheduling.

Google Sheets Log ‚Äì Saves image URLs and timestamps for easy reference or reuse.

Caption Generator (GPT-5) ‚Äì Writes a high-hook, SEO-optimized Instagram caption based on the image prompts.

Merge + Post to Instagram ‚Äì Combines image URLs and caption, then auto-posts to your connected Instagram account.

Why You‚Äôll Love It

üöÄ Completely hands-off content creation ‚Äì from idea to published post.

üß† Proven viral framework ‚Äì automatically applies the ‚ÄúViral 5-Framework‚Äù for high engagement.

üé® AI-generated visuals ‚Äì crafted by Google‚Äôs Nano Banana for brand-consistent aesthetics.

‚úçÔ∏è AI-optimized captions ‚Äì GPT-5 ensures your posts hook, rank, and convert.

üóÇÔ∏è Content logging built-in ‚Äì every post is stored automatically in Google Sheets.

ü§ñ One-click scalability ‚Äì turn this into a full social content engine in minutes.

Requirements

OpenAI API Key (for GPT-5)

Wavespeed API Key (Nano Banana)

Blotato API Key for media uploads and Instagram posting

Google Sheets OAuth Credentials for logging image URLs

n8n Account (self-hosted or Cloud)

prompts: Minimalist bold Instagram carousel cover for ‚ÄúPodcast Best Practices‚Äù, dark charcoal background with neon electric blue/purple gradient accents, modern condenser microphone icon and subtle waveform lines, large clean space for headline. Add big header text: ‚ÄúStop losing listeners in the first 60 seconds‚Äù and subheader: ‚Äú5 podcast best practices to grow your show fast‚Äù. High-contrast, crisp typography, swipe indicator arrow at bottom-right.

Frustrated podcaster scene at laptop with messy desk, tangled cables, overstuffed notes, hovering chaotic audio waveforms; soft 3D/cartoon hybrid style, warm muted palette; leave clear text area on left. Add header: ‚ÄúThe Problem‚Äù and subheader: ‚ÄúRambling intros. Muddy audio. Inconsistent schedule. No promo plan.‚Äù Include small sticky-note elements reading: ‚Äúno time‚Äù, ‚Äúno growth‚Äù.

Clean infographic/checklist design with upward listener retention graph and checkmark icons; abstract generic podcast app symbols (no brands), bright accent colors on dark background; generous text columns. Add header: ‚ÄúThe A‚ÄëHa Moment‚Äù and subheader: ‚ÄúStructure + sound + consistency = retention and word‚Äëof‚Äëmouth.‚Äù Include a 5‚Äëpoint checklist: ‚Äú1 Hook in first 20‚Äì30s; 2 One clear promise per episode; 3 Segment: Intro ‚Üí Value ‚Üí CTA; 4 Mic technique and room > fancy gear; 5 Title for search, not cleverness.‚Äù

Sleek workflow diagram with arrows connecting icons: notebook (Plan) ‚Üí microphone (Record) ‚Üí scissors (Edit) ‚Üí sliders (Master) ‚Üí RSS/YouTube icons (Publish) ‚Üí square video/phone (Repurpose). Tech aesthetic, light grid background. Add header: ‚ÄúThe Workflow‚Äù and subheader: ‚ÄúPlan ‚Üí Hook ‚Üí Record ‚Üí Edit ‚Üí Master ‚Üí Publish ‚Üí Repurpose.‚Äù Include numbered mini-steps beside each icon: ‚Äú1 Outline in Notion/Docs; 2 Record close‚Äëmic at ‚àí12 dB; 3 Cut 10‚Äì20% filler; 4 Clean: HPF 80 Hz, compress, ‚àí16 LUFS; 5 SEO title, notes, timestamps; 6 Distribute + schedule; 7 Clip for Reels/Shorts + email your list.‚Äù

Bright motivational end slide with bold colors, big bookmark and share icons, subtle confetti; clear CTA space. Add header: ‚ÄúYour Turn‚Äù and subheader: ‚ÄúSave this checklist. Share with a podcaster. Comment ‚ÄòPOD‚Äô for my templates.‚Äù Add footer note: ‚ÄúFollow for weekly podcast growth playbooks.‚Äù

json.chatInput: Create an IG carousel of 5 images around the topic of best practices for podcast

Automating Start-Up and Business processes.
